import React from 'react'; import './App.css'; import Header from './components/Header'; import Navigation from './components/Navigation'; import HeroSection from './components/HeroSection'; import PaymentSection from './components/PaymentSection'; import Footer from './components/Footer'; function App() { const paymentMethods = [ { id: 'check', title: 'Paper Check Payment', icon: 'üìÑ', description: 'Preferred payment method - Traditional check', features: ['Secure', 'No processing fees', 'Physical record'], instructions: `Step 1: Make check payable to "MC Movers" Step 2: Write the deposit amount in numbers and words Step 3: **IMPORTANT: Include your Job Number on the check in the memo line** Step 4: Take a clear picture of the check - All corners and edges must be visible - Check must be legible and clear - Image must be suitable for mobile deposit scanning Step 5: Send the image via email to: info@mc-movers.com OR text the image to us Step 6: After sending the image, mail the physical check to: 1021 Ives Dairy Rd Ste 212, Miami, FL 33179 Step 7: Keep a copy of the check for your records Note: This is our preferred payment method. The check image allows us to process your deposit quickly, while the physical check provides security.` }, { id: 'zelle', title: 'Zelle Payment', icon: 'üí≥', description: 'Alternative option - Bank-to-bank transfer', features: ['Instant transfer', 'No fees', 'Bank-level security'], instructions: `Step 1: Open your banking app or Zelle app Step 2: Select "Send Money" or "Send with Zelle" Step 3: Enter our email: info@mc-movers.com Step 4: Enter the deposit amount Step 5: Add a note: "Moving Deposit - [Your Name] - Job #[Job Number]" Step 6: Review and send the payment Step 7: Keep the confirmation number for your records Note: This option is available only if you prefer not to use a check. Zelle payments are instant and secure. Make sure to include your Job Number in the payment note.` }, { id: 'venmo', title: 'Venmo Payment', icon: 'üì±', description: 'Alternative option - Mobile payment (3.5% fee)', features: ['Mobile app', 'Quick payment', '3.5% processing fee'], instructions: `Step 1: Open the Venmo app on your phone Step 2: Tap "Pay or Request" at the bottom Step 3: Search for: @mcmovers Step 4: Enter the deposit amount Step 5: Add a note: "Moving Deposit - [Your Name] - Job #[Job Number]" Step 6: Select "Pay" and confirm Step 7: Take a screenshot of the confirmation Important Information: - There is a 3.5% processing fee for this payment method - This option is available only if you prefer not to use check, Zelle, or other methods - Make sure to use the correct Venmo handle: @mcmovers - Include your Job Number in the payment note` }, { id: 'creditcard', title: 'Credit / Debit Card Payment', icon: 'üí≥', description: 'Alternative option - Card payment (5% fee)', features: ['Secure processing', '5% processing fee', 'Widely accepted'], instructions: `Step 1: Contact us at (800) 807-2173 to process your payment Step 2: Have your card ready (credit or debit card) Step 3: Provide your Job Number and deposit amount Step 4: Our team will securely process your payment over the phone Step 5: You will receive a confirmation email with receipt Step 6: Keep the confirmation for your records Important Information: - There is a 5% processing fee for this payment method - This option is available if you prefer not to use check, Zelle, or Venmo - Please have your Job Number ready when calling - All card payments are processed securely through our payment system` }, { id: 'terms', title: 'Terms and Conditions', icon: 'üìã', description: 'Important documents and policies', features: ['Legal protection', 'Clear terms', 'Insurance info'], instructions: `Important Documents for Your Move: üìã BILL OF LADING (BOL) - Your official contract for the move - Lists all items being transported - Must be signed before loading begins - Keep your copy throughout the move üìÑ HOUSEHOLD GOODS CONTRACT - Detailed terms and conditions - Insurance coverage information - Claims process and procedures - Your rights and responsibilities üìù TERMS AND CONDITIONS - Payment terms and deadlines - Cancellation policy - Additional charges and fees - Dispute resolution process Contact us at (800) 807-2173 for any questions about these documents.` }, { id: 'auto', title: 'Auto Transport Deposits', icon: 'üöó', description: 'Vehicle shipping services', features: ['Door-to-door', 'Fully insured', 'Professional handling'], instructions: `Step 1: Contact us at (800) 807-2173 to schedule Step 2: Provide vehicle details (make, model, year, VIN) Step 3: Get your quote and deposit amount Step 4: Choose your preferred payment method above Step 5: Include "Auto Transport" in payment notes Step 6: We'll confirm your pickup date and time Step 7: Prepare your vehicle (remove personal items, check fluids) Note: Auto transport deposits are typically 50% of total cost. Balance due upon delivery.` } ]; return (
{paymentMethods.map((method) => ( ))}
); } export default App;
